frameDefinitions: The speaker believes that some state of affairs or entity (the Requirement) must be present in order to cause some other dependent state of affairs to occur (the Dependent).
An Experiencer desires that an Event occur.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.

This frame models the semantic contribution of negation, in which the profiled content of the Negated_proposition is asserted to contrast incompatibly with a corresponding Factual_situation, which is normally implicit.
This frame concerns the inception of the life of a Child, generally human, at a particular Time and Place.
The obtaining of a Requirement state of affairs or the presence of a Required_entity is profiled as a prerequisite for the obtaining or occurring of a Dependent state-of-affairs.
frameExamples: I only <t>wanted</t> one piece of candy.
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
Little Jessie <t>came into the world</t> at 8 last night.
listRoleDefinitions: The Cognizer requires or believes he/she requires the Requirement to hold so that the Dependent will occur.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the Dependent to obtain.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
An undesirable state-of-affairs that results if the <fen>Requirement</fen> is not met.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The location of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> when he/she requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person (or sentient being) who wishes for the <fen>Event</fen> to occur.
The change that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> would like to see.
This is the entity that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> wishes to be affected by some <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Location_of_event</fen> is the place involved in the desired <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> desires something.
Where the event takes place.  Note that this role is of extremely rare occurrence in this frame.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The situation which is presented as false overall. The particular focus of negation which contrasts with the <fen>Factual_situation</fen> is not separately marked.

The situation or part of situation that actually pertains, in contradistinction to the profiled situation in the <fen>Negated_proposition</fen> that is asserted not to pertain.  In spoken language and casual written language, but not in normatively edited written texts, the <fen>Factual_situation</fen> may be expressed as an unmarked clause immediately preceding or following the <fen>Negated_proposition</fen>.
<fen>Child</fen> identifies the new self-motile creature.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the birth occurs, generally expressed as a date or a year.
The location where the <fen>Child</fen> enters the world.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the state of affairs of the <fen>Requirement</fen> or the presence of the <fen>Required_entity</fen>.
The state-of-affairs that must obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
listRoleExamples: He needs to focus on his schoolwork, <fex>or he's not going to pass the third grade</fex>.
<fex>Over at Merv's house</fex> they need three more cement trucks to finish the job.
I want that box <fex>on top of the other one</fex>.
Oh, so <fex>now</fex> you want to go to the zoo!
<fex>In the car</fex> I had desired nothing more than to get here, but now that I'm here...
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
She did n't know, <fex>rather she suspected</fex> .
Believe it or not, but this cake requires <fex>a pound of mild sausage</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, putting this on the agenda requires the political weight and leadership of big city mayors.
